review_data.title: Very good Fondue Chinoise
review_data.content: My sister-in-law and her Swiss boyfriend took me here when I visited Zurich. This is a small family run restaurant. I found the service to be very good. Plenty of extra meat was offered. Reasonable wine selection; we had a very nice Malbec.
